description: A strike by workers and students puts more pressure on President Lukashenko to quit.
title: Belarus protests: National opposition strike gains momentum
title_page: Belarus protests: National opposition strike gains momentum - BBC News
maintext: She issued three demands from a location in Lithuania, where she has been in exile since August. In addition to Mr Lukashenko's resignation, she demanded an immediate end to police brutality and the release of all political prisoners.
